newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai Tyre to offer cash dividend.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai Tyre to offer cash dividend.

text.p: Shareholders of Shanghai Tyre and Rubber Co Ltd have approved a plan to offer a pre-tax cash dividend of 0.15 yuan per share based on the firm's 1996 net profit, a company statement said on Friday.
An ex-dividend date and exchange rate for the B share dividend will be announced later, the statement, published in the Shanghai Securities News, said.
The firm's net profit for 1996 was 109.128 million yuan, reversing a 1995 loss of 170.51 million yuan under international accounting standards, the company said earlier in its 1996 annual report.
The better results were mainly due to improved tyre market in China, the annual report said.
